TopicTitle: "A potato like rock" avaible as a surface attached part in sandbox

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: 1.0 windows

What Happens: "A potato like rock" available as a surface attached part in sandbox

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Steps to Replicate: (can be tricky to replicate)

1) Get in one of your sandbox games

2) Open the vab

3) Add something as a root part.

4) Quit the VAB (don't save)

5) Get back into the VAB. The part you previously added should already be there.

6) enable advanced parts mode. Select "filter by cross-section", then select "surface mounted parts"

Result: Hopefully you get something looking like this:

PS: They fly strangely well for their weight. Managed to raise two of them 1 kilometer with only a stock kerbal x.
